website_summaries.verdict: The LG G3 on T-Mobile somehow packs a world-beating screen and a huge battery into a slim, premium-feeling case, making it the most advanced phone on the market.
cons: Screen resolution may be too high to perceive for some
Lower benchmark scores than some competitors

website_summaries.verdict: The G3 Vigor smartphone may be shrunken down from the flagship LG G3, but it offers an excellent entry-level Android value on AT&T.
The G3 Vigor smartphone may be shrunken down from the flagship LG G3, but offers an excellent entry-level Android value on Sprint.
The LG G3 somehow packs a world-beating screen and a huge battery into a slim, premium-feeling case, making it the most advanced phone on the market. But it's just too much phone for me.
cons: Screen resolution may be too high to perceive for some
Lower benchmark scores than some competitors

website_summaries.verdict: The LG G3 on Verizon Wireless somehow packs a world-beating screen and a huge battery into a slim, premium-feeling case, making it the most advanced phone on the market.
cons: Screen resolution may be too high to perceive for some
Lower benchmark scores than some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this phone from this seller!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst phone I ever had.Screen became defective, just after the two year warranty expired - so it seems to have low quality manufacturing standards. Fading to black after a few seconds, my phone is now impossible to use - only two years and three months since I bought it.Also phone battery was very poor and draining too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Dovile

customer_reviews.title: Screen turned blue and phone died!
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years the phones screen started flickering and then fading to black several times through the day until one day the screen just turned blue and the phone stopped working..I contacted LG and they just told me that I wasn't covered any more and things like that happens. Luckily the phone was insured and my insurer will repair it but who knows if that wont happen again? I know that this is a common G3 problem but I don't understand why LG company doesn't do anything about it... I don't recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia T.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, good price, fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for a replacement for my old moto e3 and tried 4 different phones including iphone. This lg G3 suits me perfectly as it is easy to use and this purchase was a great price. It arrived within a couple of days too without paying extra delivery costs. Set up is easy if you know how, transferring data from old phone etc. I used the lg app to transfer and that worked well. I am not up with that technology side of things but got there in the end. Very pleased to finally find what I wanted. So far working well, battery life could be better. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I have owned so far
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a new phone for ages, but of course I want something good. Noticed this was going for £280 from some store selling it through Amazon and I thought that was a really good price considering the specs of this phone and the price of what other high end phones are going for. I definitely feel like I made the right decision going for this phone! Beautiful 1440p screen and I've never noticed the phone go slow either. Considering I haven't owned a LG phone for years, I'm definitely considering going with them again next time I want to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: kallumsmart

customer_reviews.title: An excellent flagship phone!
customer_reviews.text: Had the phone for awhile as I needed a replacement & this LG G3 does more than it can do - bang for your buck! 1) Excellent specs ✔️ 2) Good battery life ✔️ 3) Great Camera ✔️ 4) Brilliant Customer Service ✔️ 5) Decently priced phone ✔️ Would highly recommend this product to others wishing to look for a temporary replacement phone - look no further than LG G3 😎 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: Hassan Abdul

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was quick.The phone was initially just to big for me (despite being one of the smallest "phablets" around) have eventually got used it and can conclude the product is pretty good, a few improvements could be the "brightness" (not exactly viewable in sunlight) and perhaps "battery", I with my usage (calls, texting, "heavy" browsing, videos, games) get at least a day, which is not bad given some other phones battery life, but could be better. All in all, "satisfied" would be my appropriate word for this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer H

customer_reviews.title: and for me personally I love it and find it hard to put down and ...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, bearing in mind this phone is now over a year old, it's still up there and can hold it's own. I've watched and read all the reviews, about this phone ,and for me personally I love it and find it hard to put down and leave it alone. Great design, great screen, great camera and great user experience, what more do you need, many of the options are buried in the menus but with a little bit of tinkering you can make this phone such a personal experience that you will get to love trust me. Love mine to bits and a great price on Amazon Easy 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Mikie

customer_reviews.title: HONEST REVIEW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its the best looking android smartphone that I've even used its even sleeker and better looking than the m8. the size of the phone is massive and the screen is as sharp as a razor the images look crisp sharp and highly immersive. Gaming on this phone is as absolute dream on the ultra HD screen. And it also comes with a bonus of expandable memory so that's nice. The performance and battery life of this phone it's also phenominal it lasts longer and performs way better than any smartphone I've ever used in the past. Very happy with the buy no regrets!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aldich

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, great phone, even better price.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous about buying this as several previous reviewers said it wasn't a UK phone. I think they were linked to other sellers. I bought this from Smart Tech Electronics £206.90 and it was fulfilled by Amazon who said if it wan't right they would refund. It's perfect. Delivered in 3 days (actually by courier on Sunday). I'm not techie minded and it's my first smart phone so I can't comment on all the features etc but it loaded up perfectly, everything seems to work as it should so i'm really happy with the phone and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: pamela spring

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: The phone in general was quite good for its age. It was also priced quite well. The only issue I had was the battery life. It would drain abnormally quick. Perhaps I received a faulty model or something along the lines of that. I returned it through Amazon and got a refund. If you found my review helpful, please press that helpful button to let me know. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ali A

customer_reviews.title: Like LG G3 A Lot
customer_reviews.text: I've upgraded from a Moto-G to the LG G3. The difference is amazing, Camera, Dialer, Internet a millions times better and so quick. Real Racing 3 runs better than on my Nexus 7... Got rid of a lot of the LG stuff and made it look more vanilla Android. Total bargain at £229. Would highly recommend it. The LG accessories are reasonably priced and you can get a 64 Gig SD card or about £20
customer_reviews.author: John Rigby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone.
customer_reviews.text: The LG 3 is an awesome phone in every right, it's got a clean sleek look, fantastic display, even though it's got a 5.5 inch screen I can still use it with one hand most of the time. A great simple UI on top of the android scheme. A removable back cover with an sd card slot for expandable storage which not many phones have these days. Camera is great and at this price for a flagship phone, it's a steal.
customer_reviews.author: RRohit

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: best phone I have ever owned, really easy to use and full of features. Battery life not great if blue-tooth or wifi enabled, but that is the deal with smart phones now a days. Screen is high quality and films very viewable on here. good quality sound and calls are very good. When texting there is a reasonable size touchscreen keypad, the auto correct is very useful ! Would not hesitate to buy another
customer_reviews.author: Mr G

customer_reviews.title: The phone was well looked after and suddenly closed and ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone was well looked after and suddenly closed and stop working. Because was after the warranty finished I had just to put it in the bin. I think the manufacturers now try to sell more phones and lifetime of the phone is just as long as the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria

customer_reviews.title: Great smartphone, not perfect but for the price you ...
customer_reviews.text: Great smartphone, not perfect but for the price you simply cant go wrong. Pros: Price Size (having in mind is a 5,5") Fantastic screen Fast phone Camera quality Sound Bad: Phone heats a lot Battery life Camera in low light conditions Camera not as fast as expected taking photos User interface might not please everyone Back cover does some noise
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant phone for the price. Beats many overpriced smartphones on the market. Android needs an update as it can be a bit unresponsive at times when cramped with widgets but this is not due to the phones interface. There are many customisable options and offers a lot of control and battery life is very good. It will last the day on moderate use and maybe half a day on heavy use. The phone charges is 2 hours which is reasonable and the best things are camera, LG experience, SD card slot, removable battery and the LG quick circle case. Great product, very happy and extremely pleased with the features.
customer_reviews.author: Syed Shah

customer_reviews.title: Not a good phone. I bought LG because I broke my ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a good phone. I bought LG because I broke my last LG nexus which I loved and wanted one similar. This wasn't. Dreadful battery life. Have to keep everything switched off and screen dulled right down to get through the day, and I'm not a gamer or a heavy user. It is really not fit for purpose compared to the nexus, but it is cheap - all you can say about it really.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone for my daughter. As a kid who swore by Apple and their products, she was a quick convert to phones from other manufacturers that are cheaper and just as good. This has turned her into a "get the best bang for buck" phone The camera on this is fantastic. I don't recall the specifications of it, but the pictures are superb
customer_reviews.author: BillyR

customer_reviews.title: May fail within a year.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone last year. I loved it right up until the WIFI stopped working. Turns out that this is a common fault with LG and they will not acknowledge the fault. My phone has now finally packed in giving me the blue screen of death - it seems to be a motherboard failure which many LG users are reporting. I am gutted as I really like this phone for the great resolution and responsiveness but a phone without WIFI is like a bird without wings....DODO -_-
customer_reviews.author: Davie

customer_reviews.title: ... user of my Lg 3 but I find it excellent, the battery life for me especially last week ...
customer_reviews.text: I am only a casual user of my Lg 3 but I find it excellent, the battery life for me especially last week the battery lasted 5 days, it was on for the full 5 days made a few few calls but that was all, was still on 35% when put on charge. I realize this would differ for a heavy user. For the price I would recommend above anything I have seen at this time. Don't see the point in paying more than double for something that is only slightly better in the specs.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Alan Rumney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone, let down by bloatware
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, let down by bloatware. I've no need of McAfee family protection software! Will probably root and install CyanogenMod in a week or two anyway :D Battery *just* lasts a day with heavy web use, easily lasts the day with light use. The screen is a beast, but IMHO no better than the 1920x1080 screens for this size device. If there was a 1080p version of this phone, I'd buy it in a heartbeat. As their isn't, I'll stick with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: I've had this phone for less than 11 months & ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for less than 11 months & the charging facility went after 3/4 months which I had to purchase a wireless charging kit to actually be able to charge my phone & over the last 2/3 days the screen has been flickering, crashing & losing colour. No one wants to take responsibility for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have loved the phone but i feel that sometimes the battery ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in early 2015. I have loved the phone but i feel that sometimes the battery life is quite poor and that the phone can get a bit laggy at times. Not to mention the trouble i have had recently with the wifi not wanting to search or connect when pressed on (Had to do a reset which didn't work, but worked when i went into safe mode twice). Being 2017 though, i think the phone has maybe run it's course. Excited to be replacing it with the HTC 10. Would i recommend this? Yes, if you are looking for a decent enough smartphone that isn't overly expensive i would get this.
customer_reviews.author: David James

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse at steal price!!
customer_reviews.text: Ill keep this short and sweet. Be in no doubt when purchasing this phone. Its brilliant. The screen is gorgeous,the camera is versatile and sharp and the phone is a powerhouse. The build quality is also very beautiful, while mostly plastic, it feels nice and looks expensive. At £200, it is an absolute steal. Iv upgraded from an S3 and my girlfriend has an S5, so i have something to compare to.In short, she prefers my phone. Dont think twice about getting it, it more than keeps up with todays handsets to say that it was initialy released in 2014. Hope this helps anyone. You will not regret purchasing this mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone at cheap price. Much more interesting than boring iPhones. I've been using iPhones for too long now, wanted to switch to android. This one is a perfect phone for that purpose. Display is amazing and few of the features like Gesture control and voice controlled camera are unique. Built in LG health app is an amazing one.
customer_reviews.author: deepan madan

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish, no longer recognizes the sim card - another ...
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish, no longer recognizes the sim card - another known fault with this model. I shall avoid LG in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Chris_Weston

customer_reviews.title: Good phone but a little ugly...!
customer_reviews.text: The spec of the phone itself is great - really good screen, quick, great camera, removeable battery and expandable memory - all good stuff. It's great to use. It's just let down by the look and feel... the casing and design is a step backwards (had the G2 previously which was a great design), feels like a low end phone rather than a flagship model. Anyway, I've put a cover on it so it hides the ugliness...!
customer_reviews.author: jbuk

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was really looking forward to this phone. Great specs at a great price. Unfortunately, it would not accept or make calls. Tried 2 different sim cards and both showed a strong signal but would not work. However you could text. Returned it as you would expect a phone to be able to make and receive calls. Has a brilliant screen and smooth OS. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbin

customer_reviews.title: LG's flagship smartphone at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Flagship smartphone at bargain price. Got this for £299 which is amazing for one of the phones of the year! Lovely phone, fantastic screen and updated to android 5.0 lollipop. Phone performs well. Was laggy when I first set it up, but once all the apps had updated was running fine and now is super snappy. Battery life not too bad either. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Moomin74

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars all the way.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a G3 which I stupidly put through the washing machine in a jeans pocket. It's a top notch smart phone. Friends with Samsung S5, S6 models and iPhone 6 models are astounded at just how good this phone is. Even Galaxy Note users are impressed. Ultra fast service from this seller too. Will recomend 100% Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: chippie

customer_reviews.title: Initially brilliant, but faulty after just over a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these phones in January last year, and had been very pleased with it; but, a few months ago, it started not recognise the sd card and, shortly afterwards, started to constantly reboot, and eventually failed to start altogther. I replaced it with a cheaper G2. I cannot recommend the G3.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Best phone
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a while and i must say its the best phone ive purchased. Camera is great, battery is superb and i genuinely cant find a fault in the phone EXCEPT that at times (with very high usage for long periods of time) it tends to over heat and restarts at the home page
customer_reviews.author: Just Another Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Recent purchase, very disappointing and unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I've recently purchased this product relying on the massive positive reviews on the Web site. However I must say this has been a major disappointment, the phone system keeps on bugging and crashing, an error message about the settings regularly appears. Hence performance is very unreliable compared to my iphone5s or previous galaxy note. I'd wouldn't recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Hdabee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clever gadget. Update : I bought this phone for my son. Few months after bought for myself LG G4, very happy with it too. Just realised that mine (g4)come with headphones, but my sons one without. I just wanted to ask if we can have those missing headphones, as I really liked mine from LG g4, but my son borrowers mine all the time, as he doesn't have the ones, that, suppose should have come with his phone too.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Big and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The size of the screen works for me, though someone with smaller hands might struggle to make use of it in one-hand operation. I like the physical buttons on the rear, though it took a while to get used to. I particularly like the knock code, as it gives a reassuring level of security. The screen is bright and sharp and it runs fast, so all good!
customer_reviews.author: Phillistein

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, buy a good case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. I spent ages researching phones and was reluctant to buy anything that has been superseded (like this) but kept returning to this (even over the g4) and I am pleased that I decided to get this rather than spend a fortune on a newly released model which wouldn't have served me any better. My only problem with it is that I keep dropping it because of the size so I'd recommend a good quality, protective case!
customer_reviews.author: Miss B

customer_reviews.title: At last!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally an Android phone that works well and doesn't irritate the hell out of you yet be brilliant at the same time (I have had several Androids over the years). How much of this is KitKat or LG, I can't tell, but it is a pleasure to use. Good productivity tool, good battery, very fast on 4G and not too much bloatware. Haven't used the camera much so far but expect that to be good. In spite of its size, the G3 is very light and my only concern is that it feels fragile and could easily be bent / snapped if you sat on it, so being very careful.
customer_reviews.author: C A LENNARD

customer_reviews.title: Does not read sim card anymore!
customer_reviews.text: Phone has now said it cannot read the sim card,loved this phone as well,found out that its a common lg problem!
customer_reviews.author: Reuben Mclean

customer_reviews.title: Core specs, screen and camera make this phone a real bargain; thoroughly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the phone so far and at £185 it was an absolute steal. The overall size of the phone for a 5.5 inch screen is hardly any bigger than my previous 5 inch screen phone which is a big plus - all the benefits without lugging around a brick. I do prefer stock Android as with Motorola and Nexus phones but this is a very light skim and works well. Core specs, screen and camera make this phone a real bargain; thoroughly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Good value phone
customer_reviews.text: I have been using LG G3 for nearly 6 months. So far it has been working solidly and I am pretty happy with this smart phone. A 5.5 inch screen is large enough to read e-books and document for me. Now I no longer carry my tablet, which I used to use for reading. My bag is much lighter! Battery life is good. The 13 mp camera does not perform well in the darkness, which was disappointing. But given the value price, I cannot complain.
customer_reviews.author: RING

customer_reviews.title: Lovely phone
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone having used it for a year. Glorious screen, good camera and very stable. A bit laggy occasionally but not unbearably so. Has developed a tiny crack in the case around the microphone, but this is a common problem with the G3 and doesn't really cause any bother. Great value for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Smithismund

customer_reviews.title: Love how big the screen is
customer_reviews.text: Only really use this phone to watch videos and take pictures when I'm out, but can honestly say I haven't found a single fault in the few months I've used it so far. Love how big the screen is, and picture quality is top class. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Phillips

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, but...
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fine! Except for the massive lag, and just how slow the system runs. It also overheats very quickly, once I open a very graphical game it can get very hot in like 5 mins, and then the battery starts to drain really fast, especially when recording in 4k. But is a beautiful phone, with a great screen, but also does not let you change the brightness to over 90 as when the phone overheats it blocks you, and that happens ALOT. I just hope that LG learns through their mistakes and improve and their next flagship. And i might refund this phone I would have to think about it.
customer_reviews.author: john smith

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is terrible !
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am very disappointed with this phone. While this phone has many commendable features (excellent screen resolution for example) the battery life is terrible and as a consequence I am constantly charging it (at least twice a day). I have tried lowering the brightness (to the minimum), reducing the screen timeout to 15 seconds and battery saving apps (all to no avail). Furthermore, on more than one occasion the phone has shutdown unexpectedly (when the maps app is running) due to overheating.
customer_reviews.author: ElvisP

customer_reviews.title: An excellent phone for a good price
customer_reviews.text: An excellent phone for a good price.Lovely to use . I've upgraded from a moto g.The Lg g3 is obviously much bigger but it looks and feels slim, like a mini tablet.Photos are good, video very good.I got the Cruzerlite bugdroid case which makes a neat, protective cover.Had an issue with auto rotate not working but a tapping the phone on a table remedied this.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in battery life
customer_reviews.text: The phone was very impressive with a dazzling screen that needs to be seen to be believed. It just pops. Was a quick phone but was prone to crashing. Disappointed in battery life, but expected really with such a monster display
customer_reviews.author: Karl999

customer_reviews.title: a BEAUTIFUL phone. the battery life isn't so bad
customer_reviews.text: a BEAUTIFUL phone. the battery life isn't so bad, and if you turn down the screen lighting the screen doesn't heat up as much. the screen is gorgeous and the shape is so sleek and comfortable to hold.However, don't buy the phone from any of the other sellers, they're going to send you non-UK models, when your welcome pack is in Chinese..you know something is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Hiba

customer_reviews.title: Top class phone at reasonable price for great spec.
customer_reviews.text: Not a big cell phone fan, usually buy well down the scale. When I needed a new phone started reading reviews and this one seemed to stand out. It was much more then I would normally spend on a cell phone but went for it and no regrets. Probably now using phone a lot more than I used to because of speed etc. if you don't want to spend stupid money on the latest models check this out - it will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: RedDiamond

customer_reviews.title: Good all rounder
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone but then that is subjective to each individual. Decent 13mp camera which is really why I got it as price for a half decnt camera/phone and basic 4k recording was to good to refuse and screen @ 1440p is clear and good colours, watching video is enjoyable and the interface is intuative.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. I. R. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: A superb flag ship phone
customer_reviews.text: The LG G3 is a superb phone for less than half the price you would pay for a similar flag ship phone from the other main big brands. It is thin and light, it has great battery life, an amazing large QHD screen, a super 13megapixel camera with laser focus, expandable memory card slot, removable battery, 2.5 ghz processor, 4g, it has everything you will ever need from a flagship device, I guess that is why it was voted phone of the year and won many awards. You wont get a better mobile phone anywhere for the price.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: An amazing device
customer_reviews.text: I had a Galaxy S5 Active and ended up shattering the camera and trying the charging port. The last LG phone I owned was the LG Touch, so I was a bit skeptical. However, this phone is truly amazing! The screen is the clearest I have ever seen and the camera captures crystal clear images. This phone is the best smartphone I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall P.

customer_reviews.title: i dont recommended it.
customer_reviews.text: after 1 month phone started to turning off itself all the time, battery time is low and charging slow af, i dont recommended it. !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing android phone with outstanding camera. ..
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic android phone , Amazing camera .....if camera is a factor for you don't go for anything else .simply outstanding photo quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: saeed

customer_reviews.title: Great value and performance
customer_reviews.text: This is a very very good phone - easy to use, has all the features that most people would want, been around long enough to prove its reliability, pin sharp screen, and has that intangible feel of quality build and robustness. Why would anyone want to pay double for the latest models?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top notch VFM phone!
customer_reviews.text: Actually purchased this phone about 6 months ago but felt the need to write a review of this fantastic phone which you can pick up for a cheap price now. I have just upgraded to the Samsung Galaxy s6 which is an unbelievable bit of kit....and the LG G3 is my back up phone. I still use it from time to time....and love it still. The screen is a little washed out but looks nice & clear with quad HD screen resolution....still an amazing buy if you can pick up for about £150.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought sim free as replacement for nexus 4 and find it's a terrific phone, very fast and able to multi task, battery easily lasts through the day with fairly heavy use and on the days when I don't use it so much can last for 2 days. Screen is very clear and is as big as I'd want on a phone. Get the quick circle case to go with it as it compliments the phone
customer_reviews.author: Frazz

customer_reviews.title: Faulty screen, twice
customer_reviews.text: Developed a faulty screen within 6 weeks and the replacement also had a faulty screen.
customer_reviews.author: Mr D

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best phone i have ever had
customer_reviews.text: One of the Best phone i have ever had. With the recent Marshmallow updates it is better than ever. QuadHD screen with useful apps like QuickMemo+ can make your life easy. Got it with quick circle case . that case is not a gimmick at all useful with QuickCircle apps via play store. massive increase in battery life because of Android 6.0 Marshmallow which will be rolling out in the next few months all over the world. New User interface like the LG G4 for the price of less than £250 its a bargin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So in mine and the wifes opinion of this phone is great. And by the way we sent the old ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace another g3 for the wife who's screen had cracked. The LG repairers said the old one could not be repaired as a board was damaged. So in mine and the wifes opinion of this phone is great. And by the way we sent the old phone to Handtech who replaced the screen at a very reasonable price and now my son has a g3 too and is extreemly happy also.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones Plymouth

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for a good price. Bought as replacement for my old mobile and couldn't ask for more. Nice big and clear display, easy to use with good battery as well. Phone is SIM free so worked straight away with my EE sim only card.
customer_reviews.author: Dutchie

customer_reviews.title: LGG3 Phone
customer_reviews.text: Had IPhone's previously but fed up paying lots of money. I wanted a larger screen with more capacity but with the 6 plus costing £600 + this was a good buy. Android is more versatile as this phone takes a micro sd card up to 128gb and you can plug in a memory stick -with an otg cable -for extra storage or private data that you don't want on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Tosh

customer_reviews.title: LG G3 short phone life
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this phone in March 2015. Although the phone performs well & has a good camera I wouldn't buy again. About 6 weeks ago battery life fell of a cliff and phone started to get hot. I purchased a replacement battery direct from dura cell to avoid getting a fake, made no difference. Phone will soon be heading for the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Roy. L.

customer_reviews.title: I bought mine (the first one) more than a year ago for £300 and it's been great. Now it's down to around £200
customer_reviews.text: This is the third LG G3 in my household, I bought mine (the first one) more than a year ago for £300 and it's been great. Now it's down to around £200, it's a fantastic phone for the price and very much underrated in reviews and polls.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Superb phone and amazon service
customer_reviews.text: Superb phone and unbelievable amazon service as usual. The phone was supposed to be used (very good condition) but i cannot tell as it is like new to me. The phone itself has unbelievable screen quality..the best i have seen. Also wait till you see the quad hd video demo....pretty mindblowing:)
customer_reviews.author: John Lunney

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent screen, ok battery life, very dependable phone - still going strong after several years!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks like a common problem
customer_reviews.text: Phone mic has stopped working, only brought in April, tried all online solutions, mic is faulty no one can hear me speak, looks like a common problem, will not buy LG phones again.
customer_reviews.author: antony chappenden

customer_reviews.title: After i purchased it i had a thought i may be too large but it is perfect size. It is larger than my current phone ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone just arrived today and as soon as i took it out of the box i know i had made the right decision. After i purchased it i had a thought i may be too large but it is perfect size. It is larger than my current phone a samsung s2 but the LG is not bulky in your hand. The screen is so crisp.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Mackie

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone, great price
customer_reviews.text: Good Phone, great price. Half the price of the G4.If you want to root this phone do not upgrade to Lollipop via OTA - this makes rooting very difficult.I had to flash stock Kitkat ROM to obtain root using PurpleDrake.I am using cloudyG3 ROM at the moment. This is based on stock lollypop 5.0 but is debloated and has call recording built in.
customer_reviews.author: jaydee2002

customer_reviews.title: Great little (?) phone
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone for £227 after the G4 came out and it is a real bargain. Terrific screen and good speed. It does need a case that covers the front of the phone because almost any tapping onb the screen wakes it up!
customer_reviews.author: Trev

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Love the screen
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Love the screen. Superb camera. In fact it takes better low light pictures than my decent camera. But battery life is not brilliant but OK.
customer_reviews.author: Swordfish

customer_reviews.title: LG G4 manual camera on LG G3
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, the best smartphone you can actually buy for less than 250 £ , the camera is better than an iphone ! On youtube there is a tutorial on how to install the manual camera features of the LG G4. Look for "How to install LG G4 manual camera on LG G3!"
customer_reviews.author: M. Abdulah

customer_reviews.title: Such an amazing phones Comes out of the box running Android 4
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing phones Comes out of the box running Android 4.4.2 kit kat but instantly you get an update to android 5.0 lollipop Which runs sweet Smartphone is stylish, looks great Quick and easy to use LG skin is very standard but fun to use Camera is great QUAD HD screen is amazing Really good price So far best phone for £300
customer_reviews.author: Zenon

customer_reviews.title: Major heating problem.
customer_reviews.text: Beware this product is early made my LG and has some serious heating problem. Compare to high street it was cheaper on Amazon and bought it. Even after 1 hr of use this phone heats up like hell. On Normal usage it heats up and you can feel it on the screen as well. Battery life has been worse that I have ever seen on any phones. Too much heat and you battery drains faster.
customer_reviews.author: Shiva

customer_reviews.title: star android performer - great phone
customer_reviews.text: Beats most expectations - still a candidate for top android phone in 2015 as compared to price. The screen size, quality resolution, and performance of processor are excellent. Only down side is the short battery life. Have tried disabling features etc, however this causes a less connected experience. Please lg - let us purchase a 4000mA plus battery and give us the 5.1.1 update for lollipop. This may help with the longevity of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Upi Rai

customer_reviews.title: the best phone i've had
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far, the best phone i've had. Fast, light, great display, excellent interface, very cool apps from LG (lg health is amazing). Mine had a problem with the motheboard after 8 months, and the service from LG was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little phone!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little phone. Does everything the two main phone competitors do but for a much better price!! Looks sleek. Good features. Quick delivery. Overall very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jess A

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Phone
customer_reviews.text: Impressive Phone. The item was delivered super fast (next day) and was in great condition. The phone itself is amazing, great features, super fast with an amazing camera. It is quite large in size, but I guess phones are increasingly getting bigger. The screen is the best feature on the phone! Definitely worth buying as a new phone!
customer_reviews.author: Kishan Mistry

customer_reviews.title: Great sized rasy to use android mobile
customer_reviews.text: Nice and easy to use and set up. Clear 5.5inch screen. Light to carry around in your pocket or bag. Great Android mobile.
customer_reviews.author: MrsStanners

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise fantastic product for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in time from France. Multilingual instruction manual. Only hiccup is that the power plug for the mains charger is a French one. However I have fitted the USB charger to a UK plug. Otherwise fantastic product for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Great phone although the battery doesn't last long. Plenty of memory good camera & easy to use. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bargain in an expensive market.
customer_reviews.text: This feels like a flagship phone for the price of a midrange phone; £280 for this phone is an absolutely steal, the display is fantastic and runs very fast. It plays videos in full HD and also has a great battery life, which is surprising given the performance. If you're looking to step up from a lower model I highly recommend given this phone a look.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall
customer_reviews.text: Good product overall. Delivery was great. Hardware look great Few issues with software such as for example the keyboard which is laggy. Need to install a third party keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Clem R

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Main seal was ripped
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Main seal was ripped. Had a 3rd party seal. Too a long time to arrive but it was all the from east Asia so that could be excused. The adapter is cheap and broke on the first day.
customer_reviews.author: ibrahim cam

customer_reviews.title: This phone is awesome. Got loads of features that are really usefull ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome. Got loads of features that are really usefull and the screen is amazing. Battery last around a day but drains fast if constantly used
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone!
customer_reviews.text: This phone looks and feels really nice, and is very easy to use. An excellent phone for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only real issue is the wi-fi, after researching a ...
customer_reviews.text: Only real issue is the wi-fi, after researching a bit I found I wasn't alone on this. The wi-fi does tend to drop out of connectivity quite frequently which is very noticeable in some apps, but no issues with Netflix.
customer_reviews.author: NickNack

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: ordered this as a gift. its an amazing phone for someone who wants the odd internet surfing and calling/messaging. no heavy loads. screen size is good for the older folks.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone for the money
customer_reviews.text: First time I've bought anything other than HTC. Wasn't sure what to expect, but it's great. The only thing that doesn't measure up are the speakers, but no smartphone matches the HTC One for speakers. Got this for the larger screen and it's spot on for my needs. Price is right and it matches most of the flagship phones for features at about half the price. I'll definitely be looking at the G5 when it comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Kimi

customer_reviews.title: Awful customer service and poor handset
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working after 5 months. Chased the seller for a replacement or to resolve the issue only to be ignored. Very dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic phone and very easy to get used to
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic phone and very easy to get used to. My little sister who is only 8 got the hang of it after a couple hours of using the device, it really makes android even simpler yet adds enormous amounts of features!
customer_reviews.author: Reefs

customer_reviews.title: All good so far
customer_reviews.text: Got this a few weeks back as a replacement for my windows phone. A very big improvement and so much more functionality. Very pleased with it so far. Looks good, the camera is great and battery with light to medium use last for a couple of days. Still getting used to the size (especially after putting a case on).
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value phone, great screen quality, be sure to buy a case
customer_reviews.author: frank holloway

customer_reviews.title: I love my LG G3 - perfect phone at a perfect price!
customer_reviews.text: Love my LG G3. No negatives, just remove the bloatware (apps/widgets you do not need) to improve battery life. Gorgeous stylish phone at an amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: mads

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good phone at a good price...usual hair line cracks in frame but general overall good reconditioned quality product...
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeTy

customer_reviews.title: Takes great photos. whats not to like
customer_reviews.text: Not the latest but For £230.00 you can't go wrong. lovely big screen and not awkward to use at all. Takes great photos.whats not to like.
customer_reviews.author: Gnasher

customer_reviews.title: excellent phone.
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional, however the screen drains the battery quite quickly. Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: gamey7

customer_reviews.title: she was over the moon amazing phone at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife, she was over the moon amazing phone at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: tim harper

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ive ever owned
customer_reviews.text: best phone I've ever owned, before this I had a nexus 4 which I still have as my back up phone the screen on this is 10x better its amazing, every time I turn my phone on I still go wow. great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adamgh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. Works well but the screen dies after three months. LG replaced it but I had no phone for 10 days.
customer_reviews.author: Ruairí

customer_reviews.title: Blue Screen of Death...
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 15 months or so. Then blue screen of death with no warning whatsoever....
customer_reviews.author: mathias broucek

product_meta.title: LG Electronics G3 4G Smartphone 16 GB (UK SIM-Free, Android, 5.5 inch) - Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:blackLG LGD855.A6GBTN - G3 Sim Free Andriod 16GB - Metallic Black

LEGAL DISCLAIMER
Vat Included

BOX CONTAINS
LG Handset
Battery
AC Adapter
USB Cable
Headset
User Documentation

See more
feature_bullets: The Finest Visibility - the G3's quad HD display supports an astounding 538 ppi, commonly used to print high quality gallery artbooks. This delivers vibrant colours and ultra-sharp images (2560 x 1440) on a near zero bezel edge to edge 5.5 inch screen, so you can experience the exquisite picture quality of quad HD right in the palm of your hand

Lightweight metallic design - a classic, metallic body adds comfort and portability. The intuitively refined rear key and floating arc design make the sides much thinner, allowing easy one-hand control

Enhanced OIS+ camera with laser auto focus - not only does the OIS (optical image stabilisation) function reduce blur and shaking, the laser measures the distance to the object instantly, giving you high quality photos at 13 MP resolution. A range of camera functions means that you can leave your digital camera at home

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
